we use the color red to display error messages because of its ability to grab the attention faster than the other colors
Dark red is associated with vigor, willpower, rage, anger, leadership, courage, longing, malice, and wrath.
Red always makes you feel that you are running out of time and rushes you to take the next action.

When selecting the accent color, picking up the directly opposite hue Complementary color will just increase the competition between elements to which those colors are applied
It might be a good idea to use colors that are next to each other on the color wheel (Analogous colors) because they usually match well and create serene and comfortable designs
Light red represents joy, sexuality, passion, sensitivity, and love
result in users missing out on most important actions among other important actions
